CustomField.description: used for RVP and SVP reporting, allowing them to group by buckets of age
CustomField.formula: IF( CloseDate - TODAY() < 0, "Close Date in Past", IF( CloseDate - TODAY() >= 0 && CloseDate - TODAY() < 31, "0 - 30 Days", IF( CloseDate - TODAY() > 30 && CloseDate - TODAY() < 61, "31 - 60 Days", IF( CloseDate - TODAY() > 60 && CloseDate - TODAY() < 91, "61 - 90 Days", IF( CloseDate - TODAY() >= 91, "Close Date more than 90 Days in Future","Error in Formula Calculation, please notify salesforcecrmsupport@pgi.com with a screenshot" )))))
CustomField.label: 30 Day Buckets
